flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: SWAMPERT is very strong. It has enoughnpower to easily drag a boulder weighingnmore than a ton.fThis POKéMON also has powerful visionnthat lets it see even in murky water.
SWAMPERT predicts storms by sensingnsubtle differences in the sounds ofnwaves and tidal winds with its fins.fIf a storm is approaching, it piles upnboulders to protect itself.
If it senses the approach of a storm andna tidal wave, it protects its seaside nestnby piling up boulders. It swims as fast asna jet ski.
Its arms are rock-hard. With one swing,nthey can batter down its foe. It makes itsnnest on beautiful beaches.
Its arms are rock-hard. With one swing,nthey can batter down its foe. It makes itsnnest on beautiful beaches.
It can swim while towing a largenship. It bashes down foes with answing of its thick arms.
It can swim while towing a largenship. It bashes down foes with answing of its thick arms.
It can swim while towing a largenship. It bashes down foes with answing of its thick arms.
Its arms are hard as rock.nWith one swing, it cannbreak a boulder into pieces.
Its arms are hard as rock.nWith one swing, it cannbreak a boulder into pieces.
Il peut traîner un grand bateau ennnageant. Il assomme l’ennemi d’unngrand coup de ses bras épais.
It can swim while towing a largenship. It bashes down foes with answing of its thick arms.
Il peut traîner un grand bateau ennnageant. Il assomme l’ennemi d’unngrand coup de ses bras épais.
It can swim while towing a largenship. It bashes down foes with answing of its thick arms.
It can swim while towing a largenship. It bashes down foes with answing of its thick arms.
It can swim while towing a largenship. It bashes down foes with answing of its thick arms.
いわの　ように　かたい　うでをnひとふり　するだけで　きょだいなnいわを　コナゴナに　くだくぞ。
돌처럼 딱딱한 팔을n한 번 휘두르는 것만으로 거대한n돌을 조각조각으로 부순다.
Un seul coup de ses puissants bras suffit pournpulvériser même les plus gros rochers.
Schon ein Hieb seiner steinharten Arme schlägtnselbst den stärksten Felsen zu Bruch.
Con sus brazos duros como el acero puede partirnrocas gigantescas en mil pedazos de un solo golpe.
Ha braccia dure come roccia, capaci di frantumarenin mille pezzi un masso con un colpo solo.
Its arms are hard as rock. With one swing, it cannbreak a boulder into pieces.
岩の　ように　硬い　腕をn一振り　するだけで　巨大な　岩をnコナゴナに　砕くぞ。
おおがたせんを　ひっぱって　およぐnパワーの　もちぬし。ふとい　うでのnひとふりで　あいてを　たたきのめす。
큰 배를 끌며 헤엄치는n파워의 소유자이다. 굵은 팔을n한 번 휘둘러 상대를 때려눕힌다.
Il peut traîner un grand bateau en nageant.nIl assomme l’ennemi d’un grand coup de ses brasnépais.
Es kann im Schwimmen ein großes Schiff ziehen.nSeine Gegner schlägt es mit Schlägen seiner Armenzurück.
Puede nadar y arrastrar un barco grande. Golpea a susnenemigos con sus gruesos brazos.
Nuotando riesce a trainare una grande nave. Con lenbraccia vigorose abbatte i nemici in un sol colpo.
It can swim while towing a large ship. It bashesndown foes with a swing of its thick arms.
大型船を　引っ張って　泳ぐnパワーの　持ち主。太い　腕のn一振りで　相手を　たたきのめす。
おもさ　１トンいじょう　ある　いわの　かたまりをnかるがる　ひっぱる　パワーを　もつ　ポケモンだ。nにごった　すいちゅうも　みとおす　しりょく。
무게 1톤 이상인 바위 덩어리를n가볍게 잡아당기는 파워를 지닌 포켓몬이다.n탁해진 물속도 들여다볼 수 있는 시력을 지녔다.
Laggron est très fort. Tellement fort qu’il peut aisémentntirer un rocher pesant plus d’une tonne. Ce Pokémonnest également doté d’une vue si efficace qu’il peut mêmenvoir à travers l’eau trouble.

Sumpex ist sehr stark. Es kann mit Leichtigkeit einen Felsblocknbewegen, der über eine Tonne wiegt. Weiterhin ist es mitneinem exzellenten Sehvermögen ausgestattet, wodurch esnauch in trüben Gewässern sehen kann.

Swampert es muy fuerte. Puede arrastrar una roca que pesenmás de una tonelada sin ningún problema. Este Pokémonntiene el sentido de la vista muy desarrollado. Es capaz de vernhasta en aguas cenagosas.
Swampert è molto forte. Ha una forza tale da riuscire antrascinare un masso del peso di 1 tonnellata senzanfatica. La sua vista è così acuta da riuscire a penetrarenanche l’acqua più torbida.
Swampert is very strong. It has enough power to easily drag anboulder weighing more than a ton. This Pokémon also hasnpowerful vision that lets it see even in murky water.
重さ　１トン以上　ある　岩の　塊をn軽々　引っ張る　パワーを　持つ　ポケモンだ。n濁った　水中も　見通す　視力。
ラグラージは　なみおとや　しおかぜの　わずかなnちがいを　ヒレで　かんじ　あらしを　よかんする。nあらしになると　いわを　つみあげ　すを　まもる。
대짱이는 파도 소리나 바닷바람의 아주 작은n차이를 지느러미로 감지하여 태풍을 예감한다.n태풍이 불면 바위를 쌓아서 둥지를 지킨다.

Laggron peut prédire l’arrivée des tempêtes en utilisantnses nageoires pour sentir les variations dans les vaguesnet les marées. Si une tempête s’approche, il empilendes rochers pour protéger son habitat.

Sumpex kann Stürme voraussagen, indem es feinenVeränderungen der Geräusche von Wellen und Windnmit seinen Flossen wahrnimmt. Wenn eine Sturmfrontnaufzieht, häuft es Felsbrocken an, um sich zu schützen.

Swampert puede predecir tormentas al percibir con las aletasnlos sutiles cambios que producen las olas y las corrientes.nSi está a punto de estallar una tormenta, empezará a apilarnpiedras para resguardarse.

Swampert prevede le tempeste poiché grazie alle pinnenpercepisce le sottili differenze nel suono delle onde e deinventi dovuti alle maree. In caso di burrasca imminente,ncrea delle pile di massi per proteggere la tana.
Swampert predicts storms by sensing subtle differences in thensounds of waves and tidal winds with its fins. If a storm isnapproaching, it piles up boulders to protect itself.
ラグラージは　波音や　潮風の　わずかなn違いを　ヒレで　感じ　嵐を　予感する。n嵐になると　岩を　積み上げ　巣を　守る。
